resources:
P2124786 Assignment The app aims to make tasks such as homework and chores rewarding to kids.

Hence, the concept of this app is "Gamified task" where kids can complete tasks and chores approved by their parents and accumulate points which can be redeemed for rewards such as toys and more.

Features of the app include:
⚪ Adding tasks
⚪ Parental verification
⚪ Setting goals
⚪ Monitoring progress
and more! DoIt aims to make tasks such as homework and chores rewarding to users.

Hence, the concept of this app is "Gamified task" where users can complete tasks added by them and accumulate points which can be redeemed for rewards such as going out with friends, having a 1-hour break and more.

Features of the app include:
⚪ Adding tasks
⚪ Setting goals
⚪ Monitoring progress
and more!
